ratings.comment: His lectures have no structure and he mumbles his way through them which makes it really difficult to understand. I learned everything from my TA, so make sure you go to discussion.
You will have no clue what is going on.
Very hard to understand and tends to use examples that haven't been taught yet or that requires a higher level of math knowledge.

Professor Schulz only taught my class for the first 1/3 of the semester. He posted his lecture notes to Canvas, but the lectures themselves were so incredibly rushed that the content was impossible to understand. His review materials for our first midterm had little to do with the actual exam. He almost never answered Piazza questions.

Take Math 421 with someone else. Absolutely horrible, worst math professor I have ever had. The lectures were so confusing and everything went over my head. If you want to learn how to write calculus proofs, take the class with someone else. Please please please do not make the same mistake I did and take this class with someone else! Avoid!!!!!!!!

Absolute horrible, joke of a prof. Get ready for a 50 minute lecture that no one in the class understands. Never looks back to class to look for questions, never gives intuition on how to write proofs when lecturing. Review guide for first exam was nothing like the test. Said he was postponing midterm, then made us take it when originally scheduled

Does not know how to teach, just blows through examples without explaining the bigger picture, everyone is too lost to even know what questions to ask. Average on the first midterm was a 50%. Stay away.
Worst Professor I have ever had. Can't teach anything, just writes what is on his lecture notes in class. Does not provide clear information for any tests.
awful instructor I've ever had in my college. Ignorant and arrogant instructor. Never take his course
Did not go to his lectures after mid1 because his lectures were so awful.

Really really awful instructor, never be patient with questions, and will turn youu away if you don't understand materials in lectures. Also with really unclear grading rules, a question mark will cost about 10% of your exam score, but never explain his rubric.

Worst math instructor I've ever had. No clear rubric at all, just using random score generator to give you scores. Also, very arrogant that will turn you away from his office hours. Grade exams really slow, on average he will need more than a month to grade your midterms. Awful in lectures,can't speak clearly at all.
Very responsible professor, he gives out very detailed lecture notes and treat students patiently.
Nice guy who gives notes about lectures, which are quite related to exam. Explains proofs well.
